Package org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.api

Driver-Side Event Handlers to be implemented by a specific resource manager.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResourceLaunchHandler  
    ResourceReleaseHandler  
    ResourceRequestHandler
    The evaluator request handler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDriverRuntimeConfiguration Deprecated
    Runtimes are advised to create their own ConfigurationModules instead of subclassing this class.
    AbstractDriverRuntimeConfiguration.ClientRemoteIdentifier  
    AbstractDriverRuntimeConfiguration.DriverProcessMemory
    This parameter denotes that the driver process should actually be started in a separate process with the given amount of JVM memory.
    AbstractDriverRuntimeConfiguration.EvaluatorTimeout  
    AbstractDriverRuntimeConfiguration.JobIdentifier  
    RuntimeParameters
    Driver resourcemanager parameters that resourcemanager implementations use to communicate with the Driver.
    RuntimeParameters.NodeDescriptorHandler  
    RuntimeParameters.ResourceAllocationHandler  
    RuntimeParameters.ResourceStatusHandler  
    RuntimeParameters.RuntimeStatusHandler
